poll_info.title: NuggMD Cannabis Consumer Poll - Q3 2025 Omnibus
poll_info.methodology: Digital questionnaire sent to opt-in list of verified cannabis consumers via NuggMD.com first-party data

questions.question_text: Do you support THC limits on edible cannabis products?
What is your level of interest in cannabis dispensaries that double as cafes, social clubs, or wellness hubs?

In a widely publicized incident earlier this year, federal immigration officials targeted two California cannabis facilities for potential violations. How does enforcement that targets cannabis businesses affect your trust in law enforcement personnel broadly?
Would a tax increase of $2 on $50 worth of dispensary cannabis (4%) cause you to rely on unregulated sources or untaxed products?
Under that scenario, which of the following would you use instead?
questions.question_note: Conditional question - asked only to respondents who answered 'Yes' or 'Maybe' to Question 4A

questions.question_text: In many markets, hemp-derived THC beverages are commonly available outside of regulated cannabis dispensaries. How often do you consume these beverages?
REDACTED - This question was asked in partnership with Cultivated Media and is exclusively available to that partner.

demographics.population: Representative sample of cannabis consumers in state-legal markets
demographics.sample_method: Sourced from independent providers of verified consumer data and first-party data
demographics.verification: Regular cannabis users. A strong majority of the sample reports daily or weekly cannabis use.
